Articles.Content:
So I built this awesome stunt plane in KSP and it uses 4 Rockomax 24-77 engines (The small orange ones). Last night while playing It worked great and I had fun with it. I just loaded my game again and now its instantly flaming out as soon as I launch. I have fuel connected to the engines along with an air intake. Please help.

Mods Installed: Novapunch, KAS, Quantum Struts, Procedural-Fairings, & Aviation Lights.
24-77 aren't rockets? they need liquidfuel and oxidizer, not intakeair
